narrative.title: 90 Leichte Division - 1943Q1
narrative.situation: German Light Infantry Division deployed in North Africa during 1943Q1.
narrative.objectives: Light infantry division conducting defensive operations in Tunisia Campaign
narrative.axis_objective: Maintain defensive positions and inflict maximum casualties on Allied forces.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and secure strategic objectives while minimizing casualties.

weather.terrain: Southern Tunisia - Mareth Line fortifications, coastal plain, Matmata Hills, Wadi Zigzaou anti-tank ditch, mixed rocky desert and agricultural areas

air_support.note: No theater air summary available for this quarter

special_rules: Experienced in defensive warfare and delaying actions
Veteran of continuous North African combat since 1941
Skilled at mobile defense with limited resources
